TEXT.TITLE: TEXAS INSTRUMENTS <TXN> EXECUTIVE TO RETIRE
TEXT.BODY: Texas Instruments Incorp said its executive vice president Grant Dove will take an early retirement effective July. The company said Dove will become chairman and chief executive officer of <Microelectronics and Computer Technology Corp> of Austin. He will have worked 28 years with Texas Instruments, the company said. Reuter
